entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 07:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -42.8°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
